data.title: Wave Terminal — Upgrade Your Command Line
data.description: Stop Context Switching by Bringing Context Into Your Terminal. Wave is an open-source terminal with superpowers, integrating file previews, file editing, AI, web browsing, and workspace organization. Available for MacOS, Linux, and Windows.
data.content:
Wave Terminal — Upgrade Your Command Line
===============

Stop Context Switching

by Bringing Context Into Your Terminal

Wave is an open-source terminal with superpowers, integrating file previews, file editing, AI, web browsing, and workspace organization.

Available for MacOS, Linux, and Windows.

Manage Remote Machines

Quickly switch between remote servers and clusters with our SSH connection manager (with WSL support)

Screen Splitting and Layouts

Split screens and arrange terminals, editors, and web views into workspaces and dashboards

Work with Remote Files

Navigate directories, preview markdown and images, and manage files on remote machines

Remote File Editing

Use our built-in VSCode-like editor to edit remote files (can even be configured as your shell's default editor)

Inline Web Browser

Built-in web browser to access Github, StackOverflow, dashboards, and your own apps

[Download Beta](https://www.waveterm.dev/#beta-access)

![Image 1](https://framerusercontent.com/images/x5bWAS6lLI79RTC6t3JzVdzJX0.webp?scale-down-to=2048)

Everything you need from a modern terminal

Visualize Information Quickly

Build beautiful dashboards using our built in graphical widgets and stickers.

Build widgets

Build your own reusable widgets with HTML and populate them with data from the CLI.

Open Source

All of your data is stored locally, no sensitive information leaves your network. No login or account required.

Customize, Theme, and Style

Make it your own and share with teammates.

Preview Files Inline

Images, Markdown, Audio/Video, HTML, CSVs, and more.

Edit Remote Files

With our integrated VSCode-Like GUI Editor. Syntax highlighting, indentation, mouse, and copy/paste support all included out of the box.

Import Pre-Built Dashboards

Or build your own. Easily share your own dashboard layouts and widgets with coworkers or publish them online.

Join Our Beta Updates List

Join our beta list and help shape the future of terminal! This is _optional_, just click "Take me straight to the Downloads Page" to bypass form.
